geometry::select_type_traits

Detailed Description

template<typename T1, typename T2>
struct geometry::select_type_traits< T1, T2 >

Traits class to select, of two types, the most accurate type for calculations.

The promotion traits classes, base class and specializations, compares two types on compile time. For example, if an addition must be done with a double and an integer, the result must be a double. If both types are integer, the results can be an integer. The select_type_traits class and its specializations define the appropriate type in the member type type.

Note:
Might be replaced by the new promotion_traits class of boost.
